meanings.meaning: 1. extent; degree; measure Usually written using kana aloneスージーほど上手にピアノをひけるとよいのだが。I wish I could play the piano as well as Susie.
2. limit; bounds Usually written using kana alone２０ほどの問題で意見の一致をみている。Some 20 issues have been agreed on.
3. (span of) time Usually written using kana alone「小川さんはいつ来たか」「１０分ほど前だ」"When did Mr Ogawa arrive?" "Ten minutes ago."
4. (a) distance Usually written using kana aloneここから３キロほど川上に村が１つある。There is a village about three kilometers up the river from here.
5. the state of; the status of; the condition of Usually written using kana alone, as 〜のほど
6. about; around; approximately; or so Usually written using kana alone
7. as much as ...; to the extent of ...; like ... Usually written using kana alone
8. the more ... the more ... Usually written using kana alone, oft. as 〜ば...ほど心理学を勉強すればするほど面白いと思えてきたんだ。The more I studied psychology, the more interesting it seemed to me.
1. extent; degree; measure Usually written using kana aloneスージーほど上手にピアノをひけるとよいのだが。I wish I could play the piano as well as Susie.
2. limit; bounds Usually written using kana alone２０ほどの問題で意見の一致をみている。Some 20 issues have been agreed on.
3. (span of) time Usually written using kana alone「小川さんはいつ来たか」「１０分ほど前だ」"When did Mr Ogawa arrive?" "Ten minutes ago."
4. (a) distance Usually written using kana aloneここから３キロほど川上に村が１つある。There is a village about three kilometers up the river from here.
5. the state of; the status of; the condition of Usually written using kana alone, as 〜のほど
6. about; around; approximately; or so Usually written using kana alone
7. as much as ...; to the extent of ...; like ... Usually written using kana alone
8. the more ... the more ... Usually written using kana alone, oft. as 〜ば...ほど心理学を勉強すればするほど面白いと思えてきたんだ。The more I studied psychology, the more interesting it seemed to me.

sentences.translation: I wish I could play the piano as well as Susie.
Some 20 issues have been agreed on.
"When did Mr Ogawa arrive?" "Ten minutes ago."
There is a village about three kilometers up the river from here.
The more I studied psychology, the more interesting it seemed to me.

1. the more ... the more ...; as Usually written using kana alone, See also ほど撥ね付けられるほどに増すわが思い。The more she spurns my love, the more it grows.

3. because; since Archaic

sentences.translation: The more she spurns my love, the more it grows.

3. Interval (music) In music theory, an interval is a combination of two note... Read more
1. distance; journey; itinerary そこまでだいぶ道のりがあります。You have to walk a long way to get there.
2. path (e.g. to one's goal); way; process; route; road 近代医学の進歩は長い道程を歩んだ。The advancement of modern medicine was a long process.
道程 【みちのり】、道程 【どうてい】

sentences.translation: You have to walk a long way to get there.
The advancement of modern medicine was a long process.

meanings.type: Adverb (fukushi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Na-adjective (keiyodoshi)
meanings.meaning: 1. very; greatly; much; considerably; to a large extent; quite Usually written using kana alone, See also よほど, 余 is atejiあいつがガッツポーズするなんて、よっぽど嬉しかったんだろうな。It must have been something really big for him to strike a triumphant pose like that.
2. just about to; almost; very nearly Usually written using kana alone, See also よほど
余っ程: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: It must have been something really big for him to strike a triumphant pose like that.
